text: Split single logical table into disjoint physical segments that are stored/managed separately. [deally partitioning is transparent to the application. » The application accesses logical tables and does not care how things are stored. » Not always true in distributed DBMSs. == CMU-DB || “ I D Pl o) 59:53/1:12:51 - DATABASE PARTITIONING > 9 $ — O. 13 - Query Execution Il (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
